meanings.definition: A large carnivorous mammal native to Madagascar.
meanings.sent1: The fossas in the zoo were sleeping in the sun.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of fossas in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The fossas decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as fierce as a pack of fossas hunting.
meanings.sent5: The sound of fossas hunting echoed through the forest.

meanings.definition: The plural form of fossa, referring to multiple individuals of the species.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of fossas roaming together in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The fossas' footprints were visible in the mud.
meanings.sent3: The fossas held a meeting to discuss their next hunting strategy.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was as lively as a gathering of fossas.
meanings.sent5: The sight of multiple fossas moving in unison was mesmerizing.
